title: Friday Post Show (6-18-21)
itunes:title: Friday Post Show (6-18-21)
description:
Bobby talks about Jessie James Decker being in Greece for vacation for a month. We also check in with Eddie for the last time we will see him before he starts walking from West Virginia down to Tennessee. He talks about what he is most the afraid of during the walk…it’s what he may encounter aside from the walk itself. Bobby also shares an awful story about an elderly man getting mugged and his cane stolen. It reminds Bobby of when he used to play in shady Poker games.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Bobby talks about Jessie James Decker being in Greece for vacation for a month. We also check in with Eddie for the last time we will see him before he starts walking from West Virginia down to Tennessee. He talks about what he is most the afraid of during the walk…it’s what he may encounter aside from the walk itself. Bobby also shares an awful story about an elderly man getting mugged and his cane stolen. It reminds Bobby of when he used to play in shady Poker games.
